title: Free the artist
tags: how to unlock free the artist
content:
on for clues. We found a stash of client information. Maybe it will contain clues about how to exorcise the spirit possessing Oskar.

Obtain the Torch of Revocation

We made an enemy of Carrion, so we'll have to find the Torch of Revocation ourselves. It must be around here somewhere. We found Oskar on a list of Mystic Carrion's clients. It revealed that a Torch of Revocation can be used to destroy the cursed portrait. We need to find one.

Destroy the cursed portrait in the Jannath Estate
